mapper.html:
Hi Team,
Were excited to announce that a new team member will be joining Smile Cliniq soon! Heres a quick snapshot to help you prepare:

Photo: See Attachment
Name & Role: {{2.Name}} {{9.Title}}
DISC Profile: See Attachment

Start Date: {{formatDate(2.`Onboarding Start Date`; "DD-MM-YYY")}}

Please make sure youre ready to warmly welcome your new colleague on their first day. Everything you need to support their onboarding will be available on your Induction Dashboard.

As always, thank you for playing your part in helping us build a team that shares our commitment to our mission statement to ~ Positively impact peoples lives by transforming their oral health and smile.
Lets give them the warm, supportive welcome Smile Cliniq is known for!

All the best! Smile Cliniq Hiring Team
mapper.subject: Get Ready to Welcome Your New Team Member!
